page.title: 15Education Part 3
page.content: {Morning }activities start with morning assembly.This consists of a 2 prayers, a short homily and 1 hymn.This is usua lly over by 9.30.The children then spl it up into their 2 groups for the rest of the day.The rest of the morning is devoted to the formal aspects of educ ation in both classes.These include al ways Mathematics,Reading and English Language.There is a 20 minute break at 10.40.AT{Mid-day }the meals are delive red by van from the Bedford Street Sch ool Kitchen.Only 2 children out of 24 have a school meal plus the 2 teachers and 2 dinner ladies.This gives an indi cation of the quality and price.Lesson s begin again at 1.00 p.m.The {Afterno {on }is devoted to the less formal aspe cts of education such as the Humanitie s,science,art and drama.The afternoon {Break}is taken from 2.40 till 3.00 p.m School finishes with prayers at 3.30.
